title: AE插件：特殊编码加速输出渲染插件 Aescripts AfterCodecs v1.2 CE + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: AfterCodecs 是一款专为 Adobe After Effects 设计的编码输出插件，支持输出 H264、H265 和 ProRes 等高质量编码格式。相比 AE 自带的输出功能，该插件渲染速度更快、文件体积更小且画质更佳。插件原生支持 Windows 平台的 ProRes 输出，以及基于 x264 和 x265 的高效视频压缩，适用于需要轻量高质视频输出的专业用户。

supported_codecs.x264: Best H264/AVC implementation, outperforms Adobe Media Encoder, QuickTime H264 and AE’s built-in H264
supported_codecs.x264_RGB: Avoids YUV colorspace, ideal for storing separate channels (e.g., UV map, Alphas)

features: Option to choose ProRes 4444 Alpha depth: 16 bits or 8 bits
Enabled lossless for x265 (99 for 422, 100 for 444)
Warning for odd width/height instead of generic error
New shortcuts: ESC to exit dialog, Shift+ESC to reposition to top-left
bug_fixes: Slight color shifts in ProRes mostly corrected
warnings: Previous project items using AfterCodecs are incompatible with v1.2 and must be reconfigured
Windows: ProRes 4444 8-bit Alpha cannot be re-imported into AE 16 bpc projects
macOS: ProRes 422 re-imported into AE CC 2014 and older has color shifts; CC 2015+ is fine
